Revival of Old Advent Truths 

     There is a work of sacred importance for ministers and people to do. They are to study the history of the cause and people of God. They are not to forget the past dealing of God with His people. They are to revive and recount the truths that have come to seem of little value to those who do not know by personal experience of the power and 
                                                                           158
brightness that accompanied them when they were first seen and understood. In all their original freshness and power these truths are to be given to the world.--Manuscript 22, 1890.
